thumb.title: 【UTAUカバー曲】アイアン・ベルベット【ソナタ・筆音クミ】
thumb.description: There's also no lyric video this time, as I couldn't format it properly.However, I have included the lyrics below:明かりが照らし出した 理は封じられたただただ 揺らめいた 影は欠け落ちた窓の外眺めた 季節は何色？鋼の中 響け柔らかな声Light and dark intertwine, clashing violently何故 姿勢折れ曲がり 頭は儚さが増す朝焼け 暴かれた 姿が霞んだ銀河の夢煌き 流れていく鋼の音 響け柔らかな声Light and dark intertwine, clashing violently金メッキの欠片集めてみたけど虚像の日々歪む 艶やかな歌Light and dark intertwine, clashing violently鋼の中 響け柔らかな声The soft velvet I once felt is now as cold as ironCREDITS: Sonata - Artificial Ensemble Kumi Hitsune - CubiAlpha VSQx - Kagarin Iron Velvet - MakarafaP Copyright Disclaimer: - Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for FAIR USE for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statutes that might otherwise be infringing. Non-Profit, educational or personal use tips the balance in favour of FAIR USE. I do not claim ownership over the original song.
